p: This systematic review was performed according to the Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses (PRISMA) ( Figure 1 ) statement. [ 8] We searched PubMed till July 7, 2020 for HCoV-229E and HCoV-OC43 (Part A, B), from Jan 1, 2000, to July 7, 2020, for SARS-CoV-1 (part C), from Jan 1, 2010, to July 7, 2020, for MERS-CoV (Part D) and from Jan 1, 2020, to July 7, 2020, for Covid-19 (Part E). These Keywords were used:
